name: Epic Knight 2
description:
Epic Knight 2

Bad Dudes are attacking the Kingdom (Again). It is up to You to put Your RPG Skills to the test and stop them !

This is a Single Player Medieval High Fantasy RPG. It includes the following features . . .

First / Third Person
Map, minimap, and compass
Fast travel
Looting
Combat
Follower
Dialogues
Horse
Character management
Item management
Spell management
Skill Level Up
Ingredient Harvesting
Trading
Quests
Crafting
Enchanting
Health, stamina, and power
NPCs
Save/Load Game
... and more !
